==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=獃,騃}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – a child (top is head, bottom is body with arms); variant of {{zh-l|*子}}, notably in {{zh-l|*保}}.

Originally had {{zh-l|*十}} on the bottom, current form graphically {{Han compound|口|木}}.

In sense “dull, stupid”, sense is from “child-like, simple like a child”.
